resources.string: Save the key on your device for exclusive use to ensure maximum security and confidentiality, and get it for free at https://beta.openai.com/account/api-keys
Maximum length of AI bot response
The GPT models can generate a maximum number of tokens per sequence. Tokens are character sequences in text, and more information about them can be found at https://platform.openai.com/tokenizer

string-array.name: string_array_first_row
string-array.item: This application allows users to chat with an AI named Anywhere GPT, which has been powered by the OpenAI GTP-3 models

string-array.name: string_array_second_row
string-array.item: OpenAI is a company focused on AI research and deployment. Further information about OpenAI can be found at this link.\n\nhttps://openai.com/about/.

string-array.name: string_array_third_row
string-array.item: This application serves as a bridge between the user and the OpenAI backend. Whenever a user sends a message to the AI, the message is forwarded to OpenAI to generate a response. However, to enable this functionality, an API key is necessary.

string-array.name: string_array_fourth_row
string-array.item: You can no longer use this application because an API key is required to connect with the OpenAI. Therefore, it is advisable to utilize your own API key for uninterrupted use of the application.

string-array.name: string_array_fifth_row
string-array.item: OpenAI provides a free credit worth $18 for a period of three months. Beyond that, users are required to pay for API usage. For more details, please visit\n\nhttps://beta.openai.com/account/api-keys.

string-array.name: string_array_sixth_row
string-array.item: We do not collect any personal information or data from our users, including conversations with the AI bot. It is important to note that we prioritize user privacy and security and do not gather any sensitive or personal information through our app.
